channel.title: Louis Tillett – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: cult of the week – Wet Taxis
item.dc:creator: hisskiss
item.description: artist: Wet Taxis title: From the Archives year: 1984 label: Hot Records personnel: Simon Knuckley (lead guitar), Penny Ikinger (rhythm guitar), Nick Fisher (drums, scrotum), Tim Knuckley (bass, vocals), Louis Tillett (vocals, piano),Gary ‘Moneywoe Bradbury (rhythm and tapes), Dr. Bronstantine Karlarka (vocals), various (backing vocals) tracklisting: but mono never dies, last time around, unchain my … Continue reading "cult of the week – Wet Taxis"
item.content:encoded:
artist: Wet Taxis

title: From the Archives

year: 1984

label: Hot Records

personnel: Simon Knuckley (lead guitar), Penny Ikinger (rhythm guitar), Nick Fisher (drums, scrotum), Tim Knuckley (bass, vocals), Louis Tillett (vocals, piano),Gary ‘Moneywoe Bradbury (rhythm and tapes), Dr. Bronstantine Karlarka (vocals), various (backing vocals)

tracklisting: but mono never dies, last time around, unchain my heart, i’m gonna burn, you burn me up and down, i wanna come back, rich with nothing, nun’s strike, it’s gonna rain, hypnotized, in the past, vomit, bucktooth gobbler, love

further info: http://www.louistillett.com/biography.html

cotw say
